description:
The second season of WIND BREAKER.

Welcome back to Furin High School, an institution infamous for its population of brawny brutes who solve every conflict with a show of strength. Some of the students even formed a group, Bofurin, which protects the town. Haruka Sakura, a first-year student who moved in from out of town, is only interested in one thing: fighting his way to the top!

(Source: Crunchyroll, edited)
synonyms: ウィンドブレイカー Season 2

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Transgender
tags.description: Features a character whose gender identity differs from the sex they were assigned at birth.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

node.description:
__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/明田川仁)

Affiliated with Magic Capsule, a recording studio led by his father [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062).
Originating from Studio WHO. Currently affiliated with [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).
Originating from Studio WHO. Currently affiliated with [CloverWorks](https://anilist.co/studio/6222/CloverWorks).

__[Website](https://www.sixtones.jp/) | [Profile (Johnny's Net)](https://www.johnnys-net.jp/page?id=artistTop&artist=42) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sixtones_official/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwjAKjycHHT1QzHrQN5Stww)__

__Formed:__ 2015

__Introduction:__
SixTONES is a Japanese male idol group under record label SME Records (2020–), affiliated with entertainment agency Johnny & Associates, Inc.

__Members:__
- Yuugo Kouchi (髙地優吾, こうち ゆうご) – vocalist
- Taiga Kyoumoto (京本大我, きょうもと たいが) – vocalist
- Juri Tanaka (田中樹, たなか じゅり) – vocalist, rapper
- Hokuto Matsumura (松村北斗, まつむら ほくと) – vocalist
- Jesse (ジェシー, じぇしー) – vocalist, leader
- Shintarou Morimoto (森本慎太郎, もりもと しんたろう) – vocalist

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/4247590392) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/ponpokopi128.bsky.social)

He moved to Japan at the age of 12. After working for Production I.G, he is now a freelancer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/4247590392) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/ponpokopi128.bsky.social)

He moved to Japan at the age of 12. After working for Production I.G, he is now a freelancer.
